name: tinted-lens

effect.sun-moon: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon deals twice as much damage with moves that are not very effective against the target.

short_effect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon can use “not very effective” moves to deal regular damage.
